atk-s0508a26:72_0: Idāni attano patthanaṁ upamāhi pakāsento “āsāya kasate”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a26:72_1: Āsāya kasate khettanti kassako kasanto khettaṁ phalāsāya kasati.
atk-s0508a26:72_2: Bījaṁ āsāya vappatīti kasitvā ca vapantena phalāsāya eva bījaṁ vappati nikkhipīyati.
atk-s0508a26:72_3: Āsāya vāṇijā yantīti dhanahārakā vāṇijā dhanāsāya samuddaṁ tarituṁ desaṁ upagantuṁ samuddaṁ nāvāya yanti gacchanti.
atk-s0508a26:72_4: Yāya āsāya tiṭṭhāmīti evaṁ ahampi yāya āsāya patthanāya bhagavā tumhākaṁ kapilapuragamanapatthanāya idha tiṭṭhāmi.
atk-s0508a26:72_7: āsāya sadisatāya cettha kattukamyatāchandaṁ āsāti āha.
atk-s0508a26:73_0: Gamanamaggasaṁvaṇṇanādinā anekavāraṁ yācanāya kāraṇaṁ dassetuṁ “punappuna”ntiādi vuttaṁ.

atk-s0508a26:73_6: upanīyamānaṁ punappunaṁ sāliādidhaññaṁ raṭṭhaṁ upeti upagacchati.

atk-s0508a26:74_6: Tasmā ahampi punappunaṁ yācāmi bhagavā mayhaṁ manorathaṁ matthakaṁ pāpehīti adhippāyo.

atk-s0508a26:75_5: Bhagavā pana sabbesaṁ devānaṁ uttamadevatāya devadevo pāpanivāraṇena kalyāṇapatiṭṭhāpanena tato parampi sodhetuṁ sakkati sakkotīti maññāmi ahaṁ. Kasmā?

atk-s0508a26:325_4: Satthā tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kathāsallāpaṁ sutvā āgantvā buddhāsane nisajja,
atk-s0508a26:325_10: cūḷapanthakena idāni mayhaṁ ovāde ṭhatvā lokuttaradāyajjaṁ laddhaṁ,
atk-s0508a26:325_11: pubbe pana lokiyadāyajja”nti vatvā tehi yācito cūḷaseṭṭhijātakaṁ kathesi.
atk-s0508a26:325_12: Aparabhāge taṁ satthā ariyagaṇaparivuto dhammāsane nisinno manomayaṁ kāyaṁ abhinimminantānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ cetovivaṭṭakusalānañca aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a26:325_13: So aparena samayena bhikkhūhi “tathā dandhadhātukena kathaṁ tayā saccāni paṭividdhānī”ti puṭṭho bhātu
atk-s0508a26:327_0: “Dandhā mayhaṁ gatī āsi, paribhūto pure ahaṁ;
atk-s0508a26:328_0: Bhātā ca maṁ paṇāmesi, gaccha dāni tuvaṁ gharaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:343_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:352_0: Nisinnaṁ maṁ viditvāna, attha satthā paṭiggahi.
atk-s0508a26:357_1: catuppadikaṁ gāthaṁ catūhi māsehi gahetuṁ asamatthabhāvena dubbalā.
atk-s0508a26:357_13: gaccha dāni tuyhaṁ ayyakaghara”nti nikkaḍḍhesi. Bhātāti, bhātarā.
atk-s0508a26:359_1: mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso maṁ anuggaṇhanto bhagavā yatthāhaṁ ṭhito,
atk-s0508a26:359_7: maṁ uddissa tava pabbajjā”ti samassāsento sīsaṁ mayhaṁ parāmasi jālābandhanamudutalunapīṇavarāyataṅgulisamupasobhitena
atk-s0508a26:359_8: vikasitapadumasassirīkena cakkaṅkitena hatthatalena “idāniyeva mama putto bhavissatī”ti dīpento mayhaṁ
atk-s0508a26:359_12: idha tiṭṭhasī”ti candanagandhagandhinā attano hatthena maṁ bhuje gahetvā antosaṅghārāmaṁ pavesesi.
atk-s0508a26:359_13: Pādāsipādapuñchaninti pādapuñchaniṁ katvā pādāsi “rajoharaṇanti manasi karohī”ti adāsīti attho.
atk-s0508a26:359_20: rajoharaṇa”nti manasikārena svadhiṭṭhitaṁ katvā ekamantaṁ ekamante vivitte gandhakuṭipamukhe nisinno
atk-s0508a26:359_21: adhiṭṭhehi tathā cittaṁ samāhitaṁ katvā pavattehi.
atk-s0508a26:360_1: tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ ovādaṁ ahaṁ sutvā tasmiṁ sāsane ovāde rato abhirato hutvā vihāsiṁ yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipajjiṁ.
atk-s0508a26:360_5: tassa adhigamāya kasiṇaparikammavasena rūpajjhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapādakaṁ vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0508a26:360_7: Ettha hi samādhīti upacārasamādhito paṭṭhāya yāva catutthamaggasamādhi,
atk-s0508a26:360_12: Samādhikusalatāya hi ayamāyasmā cetovivaṭṭakusalo nāma jāto,
atk-s0508a26:360_21: Apica cūḷapanthakatthero sātisayaṁ catunnaṁ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṁ lābhitāya cetovivaṭṭakusalo vutto,
atk-s0508a26:360_22: mahāpanthakatthero sātisayaṁ catunnaṁ arūpāvacarajjhānānaṁ lābhitāya saññāvivaṭṭakusalo.
atk-s0508a26:360_23: Paṭhamo vā rūpāvacarajjhānalābhī hutvā jhānaṅgehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṁ pattoti cetovivaṭṭakusalo,
atk-s0508a26:360_24: itaro arūpāvacarajjhānalābhī hutvā jhānaṅgehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṁ pattoti saññāvivaṭṭakusalo.
atk-s0508a26:360_25: Manomayaṁ pana kāyaṁ nibbattento aññe tayo vā cattāro vā nibbattanti,
atk-s0508a26:360_29: Ayaṁ pana thero ekāvajjanena samaṇasahassaṁ māpesi,
atk-s0508a26:360_32: Tasmā manomayaṁ kāyaṁ abhinimminantānaṁ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0508a26:361_4: dibbacakkhu visodhita”nti vatvā “tisso vijjā anuppattā”ti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:362_2: Ekāvajjanena pana thero sahasse manomaye kāye nimmini,
atk-s0508a26:362_4: Te ca kho aññamaññamasadise vividhañca kammaṁ karonte.
atk-s0508a26:362_8: tathā hesa iminā aṅgena etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0508a26:362_9: Panthako nisīdīti attānameva paraṁ viya vadati.
atk-s0508a26:362_18: sabbassa sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyatāya deyyadhammaṁ ānetvā yajitabbaṭṭhānabhūto.
atk-s0508a26:362_21: Paṭiggaṇhittha dakkhiṇanti jīvakena upanītaṁ yāgukhajjādibhedaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ paṭiggahesi.
atk-s0508a26:363_0: Atha kho bhagavā katabhattakicco āyasmantaṁ cūḷapanthakaṁ āṇāpesi –
atk-s0508a26:363_2: So sineruṁ gahetvā mahāsamuddaṁ manthento viya pabhinnapaṭisambhidāppattatāya tepiṭakaṁ buddhavacanaṁ
atk-s0508a26:363_3: saṅkhobhento satthu ajjhāsayaṁ gaṇhanto anumodanaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a26:363_4: Tathā upanissayasampannopi cāyamāyasmā tathārūpāya kammapilotikāya paribādhito catuppadikaṁ gāthaṁ catūhipi māsehi gahetuṁ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0508a26:363_5: Taṁ panassa upanissayasampattiṁ oloketvā satthā pubbacariyānurūpaṁ yonisomanasikāre niyojesi.
atk-s0508a26:363_6: Tathā hi bhagavā tadā jīvakassa nivesane nisinno eva “cūḷapanthakassa cittaṁ samāhitaṁ,
atk-s0508a26:363_7: vīthipaṭipannā vipassanā”ti ñatvā yathānisinnova attānaṁ dassetvā,
atk-s0508a26:363_10: ito pana añño eva ariyassa vinaye saṁkileso rajo cāti dassento –
atk-s0508a26:364_0: “Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati, rāgassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ rajoti;
atk-s0508a26:365_0: Etaṁ rajaṁ vippajahitvā bhikkhavo, viharanti te vītarajassa sāsane.
atk-s0508a26:371_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a26:371_3: vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā pitu accayena viññutaṁ patto nānāvirāgavaṇṇavicittehi vatthehi anekavidhehi
atk-s0508a26:371_4: ābharaṇehi nānāvidhehi maṇiratanehi bahuvidhehi pupphadāmamālādīhi ca kapparukkhaṁ nāma alaṅkaritvā tena
atk-s0508a26:371_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe maṇḍalikarājakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a26:371_7: pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhito kāmesu ativiya ratto giddho hutvā viharati.
atk-s0508a26:371_8: Taṁ satthā mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṁ volokento ñāṇajāle paññāyamānaṁ disvā,
atk-s0508a26:371_10: “esa mama santike asubhakathaṁ sutvā kāmesu virattacitto hutvā pabbajitvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇissatī”ti ñatvā ākāsena tattha gantvā –
atk-s0508a26:402_1: So satthu sammukhā anekākāravokāraṁ yāthāvato sarīrasabhāvavibhāvanaṁ asubhakathaṁ sutvā sakena kāyena
atk-s0508a26:402_2: aṭṭīyamāno harāyamāno jigucchamāno saṁviggahadayo satthāraṁ vanditvā,
atk-s0508a26:402_5: Satthā samīpe ṭhitamaññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āṇāpesi – “gaccha, bhikkhu,
atk-s0508a26:402_8: So khuraggeyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a26:408_0: Tamhā dussaṁ gahetvāna, nivāsema mayaṁ sadā.
atk-s0508a26:411_0: “Ito ca sattame kappe, suceḷā aṭṭha khattiyā;
atk-s0508a26:414_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā laddhūpasampado satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisinno aññaṁ byākaronto tā eva gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a26:415_6: tattakaṁ kālaṁ kārapariseditavaccakūpasadisatāya mātu kucchi idha “mahāukkāro”ti adhippeto.
atk-s0508a26:415_7: So kucchi sambhavo uppattiṭṭhānaṁ etassāti mahāukkārasambhavo.
atk-s0508a26:415_13: Tena yathā caṇḍālagāmadvāre nidāghasamaye thullaphusitake deve vassante udakena samupabyūḷhamuttakarīsaaṭṭhicammanhārukhaṇḍakheḷasiṅghāṇikādinānākuṇapabharitaṁ
atk-s0508a26:415_14: kaddamodakāluḷitaṁ katipayadivasātikkamena saṁjāta kimikulākulaṁ sūriyātapasantāpakuthitaṁ upari pheṇapubbuḷakāni
atk-s0508a26:415_15: muñcantaṁ abhinīlavaṇṇaṁ paramaduggandhaṁ jegucchaṁ candanikāvāṭaṁ neva upagantuṁ,
atk-s0508a26:415_18: Sadā dukkhatāmūlayogato asucipaggharaṇato uppādajarāmaraṇehi uddhumāyanaparipaccanabhijjanasabhāvattā ca mahanto gaṇḍo viyāti mahāgaṇḍo.
atk-s0508a26:415_19: Sabbatthakameva dukkhavedanānubaddhattā gaṇḍānaṁ sahanato asucivissandanato ca mahanto vaṇo viyāti mahāvaṇo gūthakūpena gāḷitoti,
atk-s0508a26:415_26: tañca kho pittasemhasedamuttādikaṁ pūtikaṁ asuciṁyeva sandati,
atk-s0508a26:416_1: gīvāya uparimabhāgato paṭṭhāya sarīraṁ vinaddhamānā sarīrassa purimapacchimadakkhiṇavāmapassesu paccekaṁ pañca pañca katvā vīsati,
atk-s0508a26:416_2: hatthapāde vinaddhamānā tesaṁ purimapacchimapassesu pañca pañca katvā cattālīsāti saṭṭhiyā kaṇḍarehi
atk-s0508a26:416_8: cammasaṅkhātena kañcukena sabbaso onaddho pariyonaddho paricchinno.
atk-s0508a26:416_13: Aññesañhi pāṇīnaṁ kāyo cammādiviniyogena siyā sappayojano,
atk-s0508a26:416_20: catumahābhūtajīvitindriyaassāsapassāsaviññāṇādīnaṁ samavāyasambandhena suttamerakasamavāyena yantaṁ viya ṭhānādiiriyāpathaṁ kappeti.
atk-s0508a26:417_3: Tato eva maccurājassa maraṇassa santike ṭhito.
atk-s0508a26:417_7: tasmā “pahāya gamanīyo ayaṁ kāyo”ti evampi saṅgo na kātabboti dasseti.
atk-s0508a26:418_2: aññathā ko ettha saṅgaṁ janeyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a26:418_8: Appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sentīti anusayā,
atk-s0508a26:418_13: Kāmacchandādinā pañcavidhena nīvaraṇena yutto adhimuttoti pañcanīvaraṇe yutto,
atk-s0508a26:419_0: Kāmavitakkādinā micchāvitakkena samappito samassitoti vitakkena samappito.
atk-s0508a26:419_9: ayañceva kāyo bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa”ntiādīsu kāyoti vuccati,
atk-s0508a26:419_10: evāyaṁ vattate kāyoti evaṁ “nānākulamalasampuṇṇo”tiādinā “avijjāya nivuto”tiādinā ca vuttappakārena ayaṁ kāyo vattati,
atk-s0508a26:419_11: vattanto ca kammayantena sukatadukkaṭena kammasaṅkhātena yantena yantito saṅghaṭito.
atk-s0508a26:419_12: Yathā vā khemantaṁ gantuṁ na sakkoti,
atk-s0508a26:419_14: Sampatti ca vipatyantāti yā ettha sampatti,
atk-s0508a26:419_24: kadāci vippayuñjitabbassa vasenāti vividhaṁ pajjati pāpuṇīyati.
atk-s0508a26:420_0: Yemaṁ kāyaṁ mamāyantīti ye andhabālā puthujjanā evaṁ asubhaṁ aniccaṁ adhuvaṁ dukkhaṁ asāraṁ imaṁ kāyaṁ
atk-s0508a26:420_2: te jātiādīhi nirayādīhi ca ghoraṁ bhayānakaṁ apaṇḍitehi abhiramitabbato kaṭasisaṅkhātaṁ saṁsāraṁ punappunaṁ jananamaraṇādīhi vaḍḍhenti,
atk-s0508a26:421_1: gūthalittaṁva pannaganti yathā nāma puriso sukhakāmo jīvitukāmo gūthagataṁ āsīvisaṁ disvā jigucchaniyatāya
atk-s0508a26:421_2: vā sappaṭibhayatāya vā vivajjeti na allīyati,
atk-s0508a26:421_3: evamevaṁ ye paṇḍitā kulaputtā asucibhāvena jegucchaṁ aniccādibhāvena sappaṭibhayaṁ imaṁ kāyaṁ vivajjenti chandarāgappahānena pajahanti.
atk-s0508a26:421_4: Te bhavamūlaṁ avijjaṁ bhavataṇhañca vamitvā chaḍḍetvā accantameva pahāya tato eva sabbaso anāsavā saupādisesāya
atk-s0508a26:424_2: Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto satthu santikaṁ
atk-s0508a26:424_3: gantvā dhammaṁ suṇamāno satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ samantapāsādikānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā satthu
atk-s0508a26:424_4: adhikārakammaṁ katvā taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthetvā yāvajīvaṁ kusalaṁ katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a26:424_7: So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā satthu santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā upasampadāya
atk-s0508a26:424_8: ekavassiko “ariyagabbhaṁ vaḍḍhemī”ti ekaṁ kulaputtaṁ attano santike upasampādetvā tena saddhiṁ satthu
atk-s0508a26:424_10: Satthārā cassa tassa avassikassa bhikkhuno saddhivihārikabhāvaṁ sutvā,
atk-s0508a26:424_15: parisaṁyeva pana nissāya satthu pāsaṁsopi bhavissāmī”ti vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a26:430_0: Buddhena navame tattha, samaṇe aṭṭha bhojayiṁ.
atk-s0508a26:438_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a26:444_0: Dhāremi antimaṁ dehaṁ, jetvā māraṁ savāhanaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:446_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā sayampi sabbe dhutaṅgadhamme samādāya vattati,
atk-s0508a26:446_2: tena naṁ bhagavā samantapāsādikānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a26:446_3: So aparena samayena kosambiyaṁ kalahe uppanne bhikkhusaṅghe ca dvidhābhūte ekena bhikkhunā taṁ kalahaṁ parivajjitukāmena “etarahi kho kalaho uppanno,
atk-s0508a26:446_5: kathaṁ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabba”nti puṭṭho vivekavāsato paṭṭhāya tassa paṭipattiṁ kathento –
atk-s0508a26:452_0: Tato saṅghāṭikaṁ katvā, lūkhaṁ dhāreyya cīvaraṁ.
atk-s0508a26:457_0: “Lūkhenapi vā santusse, nāññaṁ patthe rasaṁ bahuṁ;
atk-s0508a26:458_0: Rasesu anugiddhassa, jhāne na ramatī mano.
atk-s0508a26:463_0: “Yathā jaḷo va mūgo va, attānaṁ dassaye tathā;
atk-s0508a26:472_0: Na ca appatvā dukkhantaṁ, vissāsaṁ eyya paṇḍito.
atk-s0508a26:477_8: sayituṁ āsayituñca yuttabhāvena vasanaṭṭhānaṁ idha senāsananti adhippetaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:477_11: nānārammaṇato nivattetvā kammaṭṭhāneyeva cittassa paṭi paṭi sammadeva allīyanatthaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:478_0: Evaṁ bhāvanānurūpaṁ senāsanaṁ niddisanto senāsane santosaṁ dassetvā idāni cīvarādīsupi taṁ dassetuṁ “saṁkārapuñjā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:478_5: Karaṇe hi idaṁ nissakkavacanaṁ lūkhanti satthalūkharajanalūkhādinā lūkhaṁ avaṇṇāmaṭṭhaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:479_2: jīvikāna”ntiādikaṁ sugatovādaṁ anussaritvā nihatamānadappaṁ cittaṁ katvā.
atk-s0508a26:480_2: Ubhayenapi lūkhenapi appenapi yena kenaci sulabhena itarītarena santusse samaṁ sammā tusseyya.
atk-s0508a26:480_4: Nāññaṁ patthe rasaṁ bahunti attanā yathāladdhato aññaṁ madhurādirasaṁ bahuṁ paṇītañca na pattheyya na piheyya,
atk-s0508a26:480_6: Rasesu gedhavāraṇatthaṁ pana kāraṇaṁ vadanto rasesu anugiddhassa,
atk-s0508a26:481_0: Evaṁ catūsu paccayesu sallekhapaṭipattiṁ dassetvā idāni avasiṭṭhakathāvatthūni dassetuṁ “appiccho cevā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:481_5: catūsu paccayesu yathālābhasantosādinā santuṭṭho. Yo hi –
atk-s0508a26:484_0: Pavivittoti gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṁ pahāya kāyena pavivitto vūpakaṭṭho.
atk-s0508a26:485_0: Attānaṁ dassaye tathāti ajaḷo amūgopi samāno yathā jaḷo vā mūgo vā,
atk-s0508a26:485_3: Jaḷo va mūgo vāti ca gāthāsukhatthaṁ rassattaṁ kataṁ,
atk-s0508a26:485_5: Nātivelaṁ sambhāseyyāti ativelaṁ atikkantapamāṇaṁ na bhāseyya,
atk-s0508a26:486_0: Na so upavade kañcīti so yathāvuttapaṭipattiko bhikkhu hīnaṁ vā majjhimaṁ vā ukkaṭṭhaṁ vā yaṁkiñci na vācāya upavadeyya.
atk-s0508a26:486_1: Upaghātaṁ vivajjayeti kāyena upaghātaṁ pariviheṭhanaṁ vajjeyya.
atk-s0508a26:486_2: Saṁvuto pātimokkhasminti pātimokkhamhi pātimokkhasaṁvarasīle saṁvuto assa,
atk-s0508a26:486_4: Mattaññū cassa bhojaneti pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogavissajjanesu bhojane pamāṇaññū siyā.
atk-s0508a26:487_0: Suggahītanimittassāti “evaṁ me manasi karoto cittaṁ samāhitaṁ ahosī”ti tadākāraṁ sallakkhento suṭṭhu gahitasamādhinimitto assa.
atk-s0508a26:487_3: Cittassuppādakovidoti evaṁ bhāvayato cittaṁ līnaṁ hoti,
atk-s0508a26:487_4: “evaṁ uddhata”nti līnassa uddhatassa ca cittassa uppattikāraṇe kusalo assa.
atk-s0508a26:487_17: Kālena ca vipassananti yathāladdhaṁ samādhiṁ nikantiyā apariyādānena hānabhāgiyaṁ ṭhitibhāgiyaṁ vā akatvā
atk-s0508a26:487_19: Atha vā kālena ca vipassananti samathaṁ anuyuñjanto tassa thirībhūtakāle saṅkocaṁ anāpajjitvā ariyamaggādhigamāya vipassanaṁ anuyuñjeyya. Yathāha –
atk-s0508a26:490_7: Yuttayogo sadā siyāti sabbakālaṁ bhāvanānuyutto siyā.
atk-s0508a26:490_8: Dukkhantanti vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṁ pariyosānaṁ nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ appatvā vissāsaṁ na eyya na gaccheyya.
atk-s0508a26:490_9: “Ahaṁ parisuddhasīlo jhānalābhī abhiññālābhī vipassanaṁ matthakaṁ pāpetvā ṭhito”ti vā vissaṭṭho na bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a26:491_1: evaṁ vivittasenāsanasevanādinā vipassanāvasena yuttayogatāpariyosānena vidhinā viharantassa.
atk-s0508a26:491_5: kāmāsavādayo sabbe āsavā khīyanti khayaṁ abbhatthaṁ gacchanti,
atk-s0508a26:491_6: tesaṁ khayagamaneneva saupādisesaanupādisesapabhedaṁ duvidhampi nibbānaṁ adhigacchati pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0508a26:492_0: Evaṁ thero tassa bhikkhuno ovādadānāpadesena attanā tathāpaṭipannabhāvaṁ dīpento aññaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a26:495_0: Vijāneyya sakaṁ atthantiādikā āyasmato aparassa gotamattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a26:495_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinitvā amhākaṁ bhagavato
atk-s0508a26:495_3: uppattito puretarameva sāvatthiyaṁ udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū hutvā,
atk-s0508a26:495_4: vādamaggaṁ uggahetvā attano vādassa upari uttariṁ vadantaṁ alabhanto tehi tehi viggāhikakathaṁ anuyutto vicarati.
atk-s0508a26:495_5: Atha amhākaṁ bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena yasādike veneyye vinetvā anāthapiṇḍikassa abhiyācanāya sāvatthiṁ upagacchi.
atk-s0508a26:495_6: Tadā satthu jetavanapaṭiggahe paṭiladdhasaddho satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā pabbajjaṁ yāci.
atk-s0508a26:495_9: So tena pabbājiyamāno khuraggeyeva arahattaṁ pāpuṇitvā kosalajanapadaṁ gantvā tattha ciraṁ vasitvā puna sāvatthiṁ paccāgami.
atk-s0508a26:495_10: Taṁ bahū ñātakā brāhmaṇamahāsālā upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsitvā nisinnā “imasmiṁ loke bahū samaṇabrāhmaṇā saṁsāre suddhivādā,
atk-s0508a26:495_11: tesu katamesaṁ nu kho vādo niyyāniko,
atk-s0508a26:500_0: “Mittaṁ idha ca kalyāṇaṁ, sikkhā vipulaṁ samādānaṁ;
atk-s0508a26:501_0: Sussūsā ca garūnaṁ, etaṁ samaṇassa patirūpaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:504_0: Saṅghe ca cittīkāro, etaṁ samaṇassa patirūpaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:507_0: Cittassa ca saṇṭhapanaṁ, etaṁ samaṇassa patirūpaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:510_0: Adhicitte ca āyogo, etaṁ samaṇassa patirūpaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:519_0: Lokamhi ca anabhiratiṁ, etaṁ samaṇassa patirūpaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:527_1: viññūjātiko puriso attano atthaṁ yāthāvato vicāretvā jāneyya.
atk-s0508a26:527_2: Vicārento ca avalokeyyātha pāvacanaṁ idha loke puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇehi sammāsambuddhena ca pavuttaṁ pāvacanaṁ, samayo.
atk-s0508a26:527_11: santaṁ nibbāna”nti sayambhūñāṇena yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāya pavedeti,
atk-s0508a26:527_12: tasmā “tassa vādo niyyāniko”ti satthu sāsanamahantataṁ olokeyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a26:527_15: sāmaññaṁ samaṇabhāvaṁ pabbajjaṁ upagatassa kulaputtassa yaṁ ettha sāsane pabbajitabhāve vā patirūpaṁ yuttarūpaṁ sāruppaṁ assa siyā,
atk-s0508a26:528_0: Kiṁ pana tanti āha “mittaṁ idha ca kalyāṇa”ntiādi.
atk-s0508a26:528_1: Imasmiṁ sāsane kalyāṇamittaṁ seviyamānaṁ samaṇassa patirūpanti yojanā.
atk-s0508a26:528_8: Sussūsā ca garūnanti garūnaṁ ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṁ kalyāṇamittānaṁ ovādassa sotukamyatā pāricariyā ca.
atk-s0508a26:529_0: Buddhesu sagāravatāti sabbaññubuddhesu “sammāsambuddho bhagavā”ti gāravayogo garucittīkāro.
atk-s0508a26:529_1: Dhamme apaciti yathābhūtanti ariyadhamme yāthāvato apacāyanaṁ ādarena abhipūjanaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:530_1: piṇḍapātādīnaṁ atthāya upasaṅkamituṁ ayuttaṭṭhānabhūtaṁ vesiyādiagocarañca pahāya kāyikavācasikaavītikkamanasaṅkhātena
atk-s0508a26:530_2: ācārena piṇḍapātādīnaṁ atthāya upasaṅkamituṁ yuttaṭṭhānabhūtena gocarena ca yutto sampanno,
atk-s0508a26:530_4: Ājīvo sodhitoti veḷudānādiṁ buddhapaṭikuṭṭhaṁ anesanaṁ pahāya anavajjuppāde paccaye sevantassa ājīvo sodhito hoti suvisuddho,
atk-s0508a26:530_6: Cittassa ca saṇṭhapananti yathā cakkhādidvārehi rūpādiārammaṇesu abhijjhādayo nappavattanti,
atk-s0508a26:530_7: evaṁ diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattādivasena cittassa sammā ṭhapanaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:530_8: Etanti ācāragocarasampatti ājīvapārisuddhi indriyesu guttadvāratāti etaṁ tayaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:531_2: Iriyāpathiyaṁ pasādaniyanti paresaṁ pasādāvahaṁ ākappasampattinimittaṁ iriyāpathanissitaṁ sampajaññaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:531_3: Adhicitte ca āyogoti samathavipassanāsu anuyogo bhāvanā.
atk-s0508a26:533_6: Dhammānaṁ pavicayo yathābhūtanti rūpārūpadhammānaṁ aviparītasalakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca parivīmaṁsā.
atk-s0508a26:533_8: Saccānaṁ abhisamayoti dukkhādīnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ pariññābhisamayādivasena paṭivedho.
atk-s0508a26:534_2: Tattha bhāveyya ca aniccanti “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā avibhāgato “yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”ntiādinā
atk-s0508a26:534_3: vibhāgato vā sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccasaññaṁ bhāveyya uppādeyya ceva vaḍḍheyya cāti attho.
atk-s0508a26:534_5: “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti pavattaṁ anattasaññañca bhāveyyāti yojanā.
atk-s0508a26:534_8: karajakāye sabbasmimpi vā tebhūmakasaṅkhāre kilesāsucipaggharaṇato “asubhā”ti pavattasaññaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:534_11: Lokamhi ca anabhiratinti sabbaloke tebhūmakesu saṅkhāresu anābhiratisaññaṁ.
atk-s0508a26:535_0: Evaṁ pana vipassanābhāvanaṁ anuyutto taṁ ussukkāpento ime dhamme vaḍḍheyyāti dassento “bhāveyya ca bojjhaṅge”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a26:535_3: bodhissa vā taṁsamaṅgino puggalassa aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā,
atk-s0508a26:535_10: saddena satipaṭṭhānāni sammappadhānāni ca gahitānīti sabbepi sattatiṁsappabhede bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhāveyya uppādeyya ceva vaḍḍheyya ca.
atk-s0508a26:536_0: Evaṁ bodhipakkhiyasattatiṁsadhamme bhāvento yathā maggasaccaṁ bhāvanābhisamayavasena abhisameti,
atk-s0508a26:536_2: nirodhasaccaṁ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena abhisametīti dassento “taṇhaṁ pajaheyyā”ti osānagāthamāha.
atk-s0508a26:536_4: kāmataṇhādipabhedaṁ sabbaṁ taṇhaṁ ariyamaggena anavasesato samucchindeyya,
atk-s0508a26:536_7: Samūlake āsave padāleyyāti kāmarāgānusayādisamūlake kāmāsavādike sabbepi āsave bhindeyya samucchindeyya.
atk-s0508a26:536_8: Vihareyya vippamuttoti evaṁ sabbaso kilesānaṁ pahīnattā sabbadhi vimutto sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggaṁ nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikatvā vihareyya.
atk-s0508a26:536_10: etaṁ samaṇassa samitapāpassa bhikkhuno patirūpaṁ sāruppanti attho.
atk-s0508a26:537_0: Evaṁ thero samaṇasāruppapaṭipattikittanamukhena sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṁ tabbilomato bāhirakasamayassa aniyyānikatañca vibhāvesi.
atk-s0508a26:537_1: Taṁ sutvā te brāhmaṇamahāsālā sāsane abhippasannā saraṇādīsu patiṭṭhahiṁsu.
